alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 3:01AM MST until March 01 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow gradually ending this morning. Additional snow accumulations of a dusting to 1 inch. * WHERE...Southern portions of the Central Mountains, including but not limited to Galena Summit, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Hailey, Bellevue, Picabo, Tom Cat Summit, Copper Basin, Willow Creek Summit, Mackay, Arco, and Howe. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions to continue into the morning commute.
info.instruction: If traveling or commuting, be prepared for snow-covered and icy roads. Slow down, use extra caution, and plan extra time to reach your destination this morning.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
